from scapy.all import *
conf.iface = 'ens7f0'
conf_pkt = "0000000000000100000000000000000000000000000008a10b910c230d250e2700000000000000000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
